name: ProceduresValueset
title: Procedures ValueSet
description: ValueSet containing SNOMED CT codes representing a range of procedures used in the evaluation and management of stroke patients. This collection includes diagnostic imaging procedures (e.g., carotid angiography, non-contrast brain CT, CT angiography with contrast, brain perfusion CT, MRI studies such as cerebrospinal fluid flow imaging, diffusion-weighted MRI, and cerebral perfusion MRI), therapeutic interventions (e.g., arterial thrombectomy and thrombolysis of cerebral artery by intravenous infusion), and screening/assessment procedures (e.g., assessment using the Gugging Swallowing Screen and tonography with water provocation).

concept.display: Computed tomography of brain without radiopaque contrast (procedure)
Computed tomography angiography of intracranial artery with contrast (procedure)
Magnetic resonance imaging of cerebrospinal fluid flow (procedure)
Magnetic resonance imaging cerebral perfusion study (procedure)
Thrombolysis of cerebral artery by intravenous infusion (procedure)
